divs: Sighting DetailsWhile we were walking our dog outside the apartments I noticed a sphere like object to the north of Tupelo traveling at a high rate of speed followed by some sort of aircraft with blinking lights trying to follow the object. I followed it across the sky for about 10-15 sec. and then it was gone. Also noticed two weeks before a strange object in the sky to the west of Tupelo.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Tupelo
There were no other sightings in Tupelo on or around September 10th 2008
